alerts.title: DHS CR EXPIRED: FEMA BRIC funding at risk
alerts.detail: The DHS Continuing Resolution expired on 2026-02-13. FEMA BRIC (FEMA) may be affected by the funding lapse. 14 days since expiration.

alerts.title: DHS CR EXPIRED: FEMA Tribal Mitigation Plans funding at risk
alerts.detail: The DHS Continuing Resolution expired on 2026-02-13. FEMA Tribal Mitigation Plans (FEMA) may be affected by the funding lapse. 14 days since expiration.

alerts.title: Reconciliation threat: Commission on Equity and Reconciliation in the Uniformed Services Act
alerts.detail: Active bill detected in Congress.gov that may threaten IRA Section 6417 (Elective Pay). Bill: Commission on Equity and Reconciliation in the Uniformed Services Act. Source ID: 119-HR-7238. This is an active legislative threat -- not the already-enacted OBBBA.

alerts.title: Reconciliation threat: To repeal the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
alerts.detail: Active bill detected in Congress.gov that may threaten IRA Section 6417 (Elective Pay). Bill: To repeal the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.. Source ID: 119-HR-1180. This is an active legislative threat -- not the already-enacted OBBBA.

alerts.title: IIJA fund-exhaustion: USDA Wildfire Defense Grants -- expires when funds exhausted
alerts.detail: USDA Wildfire Defense Grants is funded under auth_iija_wildfire with 'expires when funds exhausted' durability. No fixed calendar deadline, but IIJA one-time allocation is finite. Monitor fund obligation rates for depletion signals.
